page.description: Get the value of a substring from the blob.
page.syntax: Blob_Data as C = peekc(N position,N length)

argument.name: position
argument.description: The starting position of the data to return.

argument.name: length
argument.description: The number of bytes of data to return.

page.discussion: The .PEEKC() method returns a string of the characters starting at Position and going for Length for the blob. The first position is 1.
page.example: dim bb as B bb = "Alpha" ? bb.peekc(2,3) = "lph"
